name: Know You Now
comments: i gotta know you now, we may never meet again. i'm not ruling you out, i'm just in doubt as to what you say you're all about.
We may never meet again, Amy.
Great song.....Sad ending to a huge talent.....maybe one day addiction will move us to do more than wage a BS war on drugs...it aint workin out.....
This track is brilliant - the simplicity of it works so well - the metronomic beat intertwined with her voice. Best track on the album
I was listening to this song on repeat the day before she died.

Can't stop listening to her; but of course she can sing anything (sober) and i'd love it [2] lol same here. like her first album more than the second, i think. i LOVE bossa nova anything, she can certainly pull it off and wish she did more!
Amy has created in her descants extraordinary on beauty and the content atmosphere of passion and pathetic love to fine and unique thirst of a life.
You can finally rest now..... Thanks for the music !!!!!
